topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XVII, Part 2, Sub-Saharan Africa
topic.body: This volume is part of a Foreign Relations sub-series that documents the most important foreign policy issues of the Carter administration. Parts 1 and 3 of Volume XVII address the Horn of Africa and North Africa, respectively. The focus of this volume is on the administration’s approach to events in Africa.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XVII, Part 2, Sub-Saharan Africa
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
